imgRecognWelcomeTitle: Explanation of AI image recognition based on concepts
imgRecognWelcomeCopy: This demo application demonstrates one of our research projects on explainable AI image recognition, called Concept Relevance Propagation (CRP). In the following we have prepared different scenarios in which you can find out how CRP works and why explainability is so important for a safe application of AI.
